movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: A powerful mafia family struggles to maintain control of their empire amidst changing times.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.description: A young woman falls in love with a poor artist aboard the doomed ship Titanic.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: A man is wrongfully convicted of murder and must find a way to survive in prison.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: A man with a low IQ achieves great things in his life, including running across the country multiple times.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker discovers that his reality is not what it seems and must fight against a powerful system.

movies.title: Jaws
movies.description: A man-eating great white shark terrorizes a beach community.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
movies.description: A farm boy joins a rebellion against an evil empire in a galaxy far, far away.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.description: An FBI trainee seeks the help of a cannibalistic serial killer to catch another serial killer.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.description: A young lion prince must reclaim his throne from his uncle who has killed his father.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman must stop the Joker's reign of terror in Gotham City

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.description: A billionaire creates a theme park filled with genetically-engineered dinosaurs that ultimately go rogue.

movies.title: Back to the Future
movies.description: A teenager travels back in time to ensure his parents fall in love and return to his own time.
